blogPost.excerpt: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
blogPost.body: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
blogPost.title: Hupu - Share a link with your audience via numbers
blogPost.author: Bahadır Kaya

localize.description: 我们在播客或会所房间发言时，不能分享链接。Hupu，为你的链接和想联系的人创建号码，输入号码到hupu应用或网页，无需登录就能联系到链接。
localize.tagline: 通过数字与您的受众分享链接

localize.description: 我們在播客或會所房間發言時，不能分享鏈接。Hupu，爲你的鏈接和想聯繫的人創建號碼，輸入號碼到hupu應用或網頁，無需登錄就能聯繫到鏈接。
localize.tagline: 通過數字與您的受衆分享鏈接

previous.excerpt: Postmodern is a mobile app designed for ephemeral, one-on-one, anonymous conversations. Whether we seek to explore our own minds, or the structures of our society, we need communication tools that allow us to peel away the pollutants to our thought.
previous.title: Postmodern. - Short, anonymous conversations with strangers.

localize.description: 后现代是一款为短暂的、一对一的、匿名对话而设计的手机应用。无论我们是想探索自己的思想，还是探索社会的结构，我们都需要沟通工具，让我们剥离思想的污染物。
localize.tagline: 与陌生人进行简短的、匿名的对话。

localize.description: 後現代是一款爲短暫的、一對一的、匿名對話而設計的手機應用。無論我們是想探索自己的思想，還是探索社會的結構，我們都需要溝通工具，讓我們剝離思想的污染物。
localize.tagline: 與陌生人進行簡短的、匿名的對話。

next.excerpt: doodad.dev is a site for tools to make the internet faster, more accessible, and more expressive. The pattern generator helps you make seamless, unique, royalty-free patterns. You can export as SVG, JPEG, or PNG. It's free forever, no tracking, etc. Enjoy!
next.title: Doodad Pattern Generator - Create unique, seamless, royalty-free patterns

localize.description: doodad.dev是一个让互联网更快、更方便、更有表现力的工具网站。图案生成器可以帮助你制作无缝、独特、免版税的图案。你可以导出为SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永远免费，没有跟踪等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 创建独特、无缝、免版税的图案

localize.description: doodad.dev是一個讓互聯網更快、更方便、更有表現力的工具網站。圖案生成器可以幫助你製作無縫、獨特、免版稅的圖案。你可以導出爲SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永遠免費，沒有跟蹤等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 創建獨特、無縫、免版稅的圖案
